name: Trumpets
description:
Follow the sounds...

Based off the unsettling natural sky phenomenon.

"Strange sounds are being heard all around the world... many areas have been effected by these u̷̗͌ṉ̶͒n̴̬̎à̵̢t̶̬̋ǔ̴͓r̷̈͜ā̴̞ḽ̶̅  events. People report hearing s̵̙͘o̵͉͒u̴̡͐n̵̟͑d̸̦̊s̶͉͗  of trumpets emanating  from the sky. Though specialists have created many theories to why this goes on, the majority of this aspect r̸͈͋e̶̗͒m̸̞̂a̴̦̋i̵̜̾ń̷͓s a complete mystery."

Make sure to read warnings under "Info" on the Main Menu

ControlsMoveWASDInteractLMB

Pause MenuESCRunLShiftJumpSpace

T̴̗́h̸̢͝i̷͕͛s̵̖̓ project took a lot of time and effort so we hope you enjoy! If you do, make sure to support us by subscribing to our YouTube, following our Instagram, and even donating! All donators (with permission from them) will be mentioned on our website once it is up!

Created using Unity
